(ROOT
  (NP
    (NP (NNS Thanks))
    (PP (TO to)
      (NP
        (NP (DT all))
        (SBAR
          (WHNP (WP who))
          (S
            (VP (VBP have)
              (VP (VBN written)
                (PRT (RP in))
                (S
                  (VP (TO to)
                    (VP (VB nominate)
                      (NP (PRP$ their) (NN dialect) (NN group)))))))))))
    (. .)))


root(ROOT-0, Thanks-1)
prep(Thanks-1, to-2)
pobj(to-2, all-3)
nsubj(written-6, who-4)
aux(written-6, have-5)
rcmod(all-3, written-6)
prt(written-6, in-7)
aux(nominate-9, to-8)
xcomp(written-6, nominate-9)
poss(group-12, their-10)
nn(group-12, dialect-11)
dobj(nominate-9, group-12)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (DT The) (NNS polls))
    (VP (VBP are)
      (ADVP
        (ADVP (RB now) (RB up))
        (SBAR (IN for)
          (S
            (NP (PRP you))
            (VP (TO to)
              (VP (VB vote)))))))
    (. .)))


det(polls-2, The-1)
nsubj(are-3, polls-2)
root(ROOT-0, are-3)
advmod(up-5, now-4)
advmod(are-3, up-5)
mark(vote-9, for-6)
nsubj(vote-9, you-7)
aux(vote-9, to-8)
dep(up-5, vote-9)


(ROOT
  (FRAG
    (PP (TO To)
      (NP (JJ simplify) (NNS things)))
    (, ,)))


root(ROOT-0, To-1)
amod(things-3, simplify-2)
pobj(To-1, things-3)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP I))
    (VP (VBP have)
      (ADVP (RB only))
      (VP (VBN allowed)
        (NP (CD one) (NN vote))))
    (. .)))

advmod(allowed-4, only-3)
root(ROOT-0, allowed-4)
num(vote-6, one-5)
dobj(allowed-4, vote-6)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (DT That))
    (VP (VBZ is)
      (SBAR (IN because) (IN if)
        (S
          (NP (PRP I))
          (VP (VBD gave)
            (NP (NN everyone))
            (NP (CD two) (NNS votes))
            (S
              (VP (TO to)
                (VP (VB denote)
                  (NP
                    (ADJP (JJ paternal)
                      (CC and)
                      (JJ maternal))
                    (NN dialect) (NNS groups)))))))))
    (, ,)))


nsubj(is-2, That-1)
root(ROOT-0, is-2)
mark(gave-6, because-3)
mark(gave-6, if-4)
nsubj(gave-6, I-5)
advcl(is-2, gave-6)
iobj(gave-6, everyone-7)
num(votes-9, two-8)
dobj(gave-6, votes-9)
aux(denote-11, to-10)
xcomp(gave-6, denote-11)
amod(groups-16, paternal-12)
cc(paternal-12, and-13)
conj(paternal-12, maternal-14)
nn(groups-16, dialect-15)
dobj(denote-11, groups-16)


(ROOT
  (S (RB then)
    (NP
      (NP (DT those))
      (SBAR
        (WHNP (WP who))
        (S
          (VP (VBP have)
            (NP (NNS parents))
            (PP (IN from)
              (NP (DT the) (JJ same) (NN dialect) (NN group)))))))
    (VP (MD would)
      (ADVP (RB only))
      (VP (VB get)
        (NP
          (NP (CD one) (NN vote))
          (CC and)
          (SBAR
            (WHNP (WDT that))
            (S
              (VP (MD would)
                (VP (VB skew)
                  (NP (DT the) (NNS stats)))))))))
    (. .)))


advmod(get-13, then-1)
nsubj(get-13, those-2)
nsubj(have-4, who-3)
rcmod(those-2, have-4)
dobj(have-4, parents-5)
prep(have-4, from-6)
det(group-10, the-7)
amod(group-10, same-8)
nn(group-10, dialect-9)
pobj(from-6, group-10)
aux(get-13, would-11)
advmod(get-13, only-12)
root(ROOT-0, get-13)
num(vote-15, one-14)
dobj(get-13, vote-15)
cc(vote-15, and-16)
nsubj(skew-19, that-17)
aux(skew-19, would-18)
conj(vote-15, skew-19)
det(stats-21, the-20)
dobj(skew-19, stats-21)


(ROOT
  (S
    (ADVP (IN So) (RB just))
    (VP (VB pick)
      (NP (DT the) (NN dialect) (NN group))
      (SBAR (IN that)
        (S
          (NP (PRP you))
          (VP (VBP feel)
            (SBAR
              (S
                (NP (PRP you))
                (VP
                  (ADVP (RBS most))
                  (VBP belong)
                  (PP (TO to)))))))))
    (. .)))

advmod(So-1, just-2)
root(ROOT-0, pick-3)
det(group-6, the-4)
nn(group-6, dialect-5)
dobj(pick-3, group-6)
mark(feel-9, that-7)
nsubj(feel-9, you-8)
ccomp(pick-3, feel-9)
nsubj(belong-12, you-10)
advmod(belong-12, most-11)
ccomp(feel-9, belong-12)
prep(belong-12, to-13)

    (, ,)))

(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (NNP Indian)
      (CC and)
      (NNS Others))
    (ADVP
      (ADVP (RB so) (IN that) (DT no))
      (NP (CD one)))
    (VP (VBZ is)
      (VP (VBN left)
        (PRT (RP out))))
    (. .)))


nsubjpass(left-9, Indian-1)
cc(Indian-1, and-2)
conj(Indian-1, Others-3)
advmod(that-5, so-4)

dep(that-5, no-6)

root(ROOT-0, left-9)
prt(left-9, out-10)


(ROOT
  (S
    (SBAR (IN If)
      (S
        (S
          (NP (PRP you))
          (VP (VBP are)
            (ADJP (JJ Chinese))))
        (CC and)
        (S
          (NP (PRP$ your) (NN dialect) (NN group))
          (VP (VBZ is) (RB not)
            (VP (VBN represented)
              (ADVP (RB then)))))))
    (VP
      (ADVP (RB just))
      (VB pick)
      (NP (`` ``) (NNS others) ('' ''))
      (CC and)
      (VB write)
      (NP (DT a) (NN comment))
      (S
        (VP (TO to)
          (VP (VB let)
            (S
              (NP (PRP us))
              (VP (VB know)
                (S
                  (NP (PRP you))
                  (VP (VB represent)
                    (NP (PRP$ your) (NN dialect) (NN group))))))))))
    (. .)))


mark(Chinese-4, If-1)
nsubj(Chinese-4, you-2)
cop(Chinese-4, are-3)
csubj(pick-14, Chinese-4)
cc(Chinese-4, and-5)
poss(group-8, your-6)
nn(group-8, dialect-7)
nsubjpass(represented-11, group-8)
auxpass(represented-11, is-9)
neg(represented-11, not-10)
conj(Chinese-4, represented-11)
advmod(represented-11, then-12)
advmod(pick-14, just-13)
root(ROOT-0, pick-14)
dobj(pick-14, others-16)
cc(pick-14, and-18)
conj(pick-14, write-19)
det(comment-21, a-20)
dobj(pick-14, comment-21)
aux(let-23, to-22)
xcomp(pick-14, let-23)
nsubj(know-25, us-24)
ccomp(let-23, know-25)
nsubj(represent-27, you-26)
ccomp(know-25, represent-27)
poss(group-30, your-28)
nn(group-30, dialect-29)
dobj(represent-27, group-30)


(ROOT
  (S
    (PP (IN In)
      (NP (NN case)))
    (NP (PRP you))
    (VP (VBP are)
      (VP (VBG thinking)
        (NP (DT that))
        (PP
          (ADVP (RB aside))
          (IN from)
          (NP (DT the) (NN language))
          (, ,))))))

(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP it))
    (VP (MD would)
      (VP (VB be)
        (ADJP (JJ difficult)
          (S
            (VP (TO to)
              (VP (VB distinguish)
                (PP (IN between)
                  (NP (DT the) (NN dialect) (NNS groups)))
                (PP
                  (ADVP (RB just))
                  (IN by)
                  (NP (NNS looks)))))))))
    (, ,)))

aux(difficult-4, would-2)
cop(difficult-4, be-3)

pobj(between-7, groups-10)
advmod(by-12, just-11)
prep(distinguish-6, by-12)
pobj(by-12, looks-13)


(ROOT
  (S
    (ADVP (RB then))
    (NP (PRP I))
    (VP (MD would)
      (VP (VB like)
        (VP (VB ask)
          (SBAR (IN if)
            (S
              (NP (PRP you))
              (VP (MD can)
                (VP (VB guess)
                  (SBAR
                    (WHNP (WP what) (JJ dialect) (NN group))
                    (S
                      (NP
                        (NP (DT the) (JJ old) (NN man))
                        (PP (IN in)
                          (NP (DT the) (NN picture))))
                      (VP (VBZ belongs)
                        (PP (TO to))))))))))))
    (. ?)))


advmod(like-4, then-1)
nsubj(like-4, I-2)
aux(like-4, would-3)
root(ROOT-0, like-4)
dep(like-4, ask-5)
mark(guess-9, if-6)
nsubj(guess-9, you-7)
aux(guess-9, can-8)
advcl(ask-5, guess-9)
det(group-12, what-10)
amod(group-12, dialect-11)
pobj(to-20, group-12)
det(man-15, the-13)
amod(man-15, old-14)
nsubj(belongs-19, man-15)
prep(man-15, in-16)
det(picture-18, the-17)
pobj(in-16, picture-18)
ccomp(guess-9, belongs-19)
prep(belongs-19, to-20)


(ROOT
  (S
    (VP
      (VP (VB Have)
        (NP (NN fun)))
      (CC and)
      (VP (VBP do) (RB n't)
        (VP (VB forget)
          (S
            (VP (TO to)
              (VP (VB cast)
                (NP (PRP$ your) (NN vote))))))))
    (. !)))


root(ROOT-0, Have-1)
dobj(Have-1, fun-2)
cc(Have-1, and-3)
aux(forget-6, do-4)
neg(forget-6, n't-5)
conj(Have-1, forget-6)
aux(cast-8, to-7)
xcomp(forget-6, cast-8)
poss(vote-10, your-9)
dobj(cast-8, vote-10)
